name: Clip & Slip
description:
A skater finds herself being hunted by the authorities after trespassing in highly dangerous areas to skate freely within her cold and frozen-over world, after knocking out an officer, she now faces forces who will stop at nothing to bring her down

Controls:

Left click to shoot hook/ Move with Mouse/ Get high speed to kill enemies

Dodge and slide across the map with your brand new grappling hook! The cops are on your tail! Time to smash through them by getting into high speeds!
